app_detail:
This is not a standalone app it requires KWGT/KWGT Pro, Also KLWP/KLWP PRO and KLCK/KLCK Pro to use extra files from me.

How to use : 
• Download Pearl KWGT
• Select a KWGT widget on your homescreen
• Select Pearl KWGT from intalled tab
• Use the widget you like 

KWGT
• KWGT : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget
• KWGT Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget.pro

KLWP
• KLWP : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.wallpaper
• KLWP Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.wallpaper.pro

KLCK
• KLCK : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.lockscreen
• KLCK Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.lockscreen.pro
이것은 KWGT / KWGT Pro, KLWP / KLWP PRO 및 KLCK / KLCK Pro가 필요로하는 독립형 응용 프로그램이 아닙니다.

사용하는 방법 :
• Pearl KWGT 다운로드
• 홈 화면에서 KWGT 위젯을 선택하십시오.
• Intalled 탭에서 Pearl KWGT 선택
• 원하는 위젯을 사용하십시오.

KWGT
• KWGT : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget
• KWGT Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.widget.pro

KLWP
• KLWP : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.wallpaper
• KLWP Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.wallpaper.pro

KLCK
• KLCK : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.lockscreen
• KLCK Pro Key : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kustom.lockscreen.pro
